department.ch: 地球系統科學國際研究生博士學位學程

remark.ch: 上課地點：中研院環變中心6040室
remark.en: Classroom：Room 6040, Research Center For Environmental Changes, Academia Sinica.

goal.ch: 了解生物相關物質(e.g., 碳)在海洋的循環過程的基本觀念及調控機制
goal.en: Understand the fundamental concepts and regulating mechanisms for how bioactive material (e.g., carbon) is cycled in the ocean

textbook.en: “Ocean Biogeochemical Dynamics” by Sarmiento and Gruber (2006)“Introduction to Marine Biogeochemistry“ by Libes (2009)

officeHour.ch: Mon 3-5 p.m. at RCEC 6032 by appointment
officeHour.en: Mon 3-5 p.m. at RCEC 6032 by appointment

ch.competencies: 進階數理及專業知識能力
觀測模擬及分析推理能力
國際視野與語文溝通能力
專業倫理及服務學習之能力
電腦及程式語言應用能力

en.competencies: Advanced mathematical and professional knowledge and ability
Observation simulation and analysis of reasoning ability
International perspective and language communication skills
